name: @mesto/core
description: Единый API для проектов, связанных с mesto.co

scripts.eslint: [ "$CI" = true ] && eslint --quiet -f codeframe --ext js,ts . || eslint --ext js,ts .
scripts.eslint:fix: [ "$CI" = true ] && eslint --quiet -f codeframe --ext js,ts . --fix || eslint --ext js,ts . --fix
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run tsc
scripts.clean: rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && docker-compose -f ./docker-compose-dev.yml rm --force && rimraf app
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:api
scripts.test:ci: node utils/wait-for.js core 8080 50000 && npm run test
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate --build --exit-code-from core
scripts.start:in-docker:ci: node utils/wait-for.js postgres 5432 50000 && npm run build && knex migrate:latest && node .
